result.name: appeals-database
result.notes: Records of appeals against property tax and valuation matters

organization.name: valuation-tribunal-service
organization.title: Valuation Tribunal Service
organization.description:
The Valuation Tribunal is made up of a judicial statutory body - the Valuation Tribunal for England (VTE) - and an administrative statutory body - the Valuation Tribunal Service (VTS). It deals with appeals about Council Tax and non-domestic (business) rates.

Valuation Tribunal is a tribunal non-departmental public body of the Department for Communities and Local Government.

http://www.valuationtribunal.gov.uk/

result.title: Appeals database

extras.value: Release would be dependant on establishing an appropriate way of removing sensitive personal data and data which may prejudice appeals
